name: Findr Interactive
overview:
Full service boutique digital agency dedicated to reinventing the future of brands in a digital environment. We believe in connecting new thinking with new technologies and are always on the forefront of innovation. We empower our clients to lead in the interactive realm by delivering the optimal experience for their consumers through the integrated use of ideas and technology.

We are pretty good at fresh ideas

….and are sure you’ll like what you hear. Our days often start with lots of coffee and the enthusiastic bouncing back and forth of ideas. Some good, some lets just say are too advanced for our time, but all interesting. Ideas on projects we are working on, thoughts on the works we admire, our brilliant solutions to worlds problems and of course, some ideas on how to relate with the world around us. We are in the business of relationship building. The mystique of human behavior and innovation drives us and our thinking.
